data: That I was in a hard case is best attested by the fact that when I had paid for my Sunday _Herald_ there was left in my purse just one tuppence-haâ€™penny stamp and two copper cents, one dated 1873, the other 1894.
Mrs. Raffles: Being the Adventures of an Amateur Crackswoman
